alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:58PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mesa County through 430 PM MDT... At 358 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles east of Castle Valley, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gateway. This includes Colorado 141 between mile markers 106 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; La Sal and Abajo Mountains
